desc: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events.
example: Time passes quickly when you're having fun.

desc: A period of 24 hours or the time between sunrise and sunset.
example: Today is a beautiful sunny day.

desc: The period of darkness in each twenty-four hours; the time from sunset to sunrise.
example: I like to read at night before bed.

desc: A unit of time equal to 60 minutes.
example: The movie lasted for two hours.

desc: A unit of time equal to 60 seconds.
The basic unit of time, equal to one sixtieth of a minute.
example: It only took a few seconds.
We will go on vacation next week.

desc: A period of about four weeks or one twelfth of a year.
A period of 12 months or 365 days.
example: We lived in that house for one year.
This castle was built in the 12th century.
